channel.title: bees – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: Boraging free
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: I believe it was Al Pacino, starring as cross-border horticulturalist Tony Montana in the movie Scarface, who said: First you get the borage, then you get the power. Then, you get the bees. It was something like that, anyway. Let’s back up a bit. Despite having lived at our current flat for over a year Continue reading →
item.p: I believe it was Al Pacino, starring as cross-border horticulturalist Tony Montana in the movie Scarface, who said: First you get the borage, then you get the power. Then, you get the bees. It was something like that, anyway. Let’s back up a bit. Despite having lived at our current flat for over a year Continue reading →
